Summary: Biochemical reaction from theophylline to 1,3,7-trimethyluric acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by XDH, CYP2E1 or CYP1A2.
Biochemical reaction from theophylline to 3-methylxanthine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from 1-methylxanthine to 1-methyluric acid. This interaction is catalyzed by XDH.
Biochemical reaction from theophylline to caffeine.
Biochemical reaction from theophylline to 1-methylxanthine. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2 or CYP3A4.
